sourcesContent:
import "../Styles/ProductDetails.scss"; export function ProductDetails({ details }) { console.log(details) let condicion if(details.condition=="new"){condicion="Nuevo"}else{condicion="Usado"} return (
{`${condicion} - ${details.sold_quantity} vendidos`}
{details.title}
{`$ ${details.price.decimals}`}
); }
